D

database - package database
Contains the definition of a PostgreSQL database connection class, which is used to read and write layers to a database representation.
database - Variable in class file_handling.DatabaseCredentialsManager
 
DatabaseCatalog - Class in application_frames
Displays the connected databases, tables and the layers.
Layers can also be added to the drawing panel directly and can be deleted from the database as well.
DatabaseCatalog(DatabaseConnection) - Constructor for class application_frames.DatabaseCatalog
Creates the Frame for the Database Catalog
DatabaseConnection - Class in database
An object representing a connection to a PostgreSQL database.
DatabaseConnection(String, int, String, String, String) - Constructor for class database.DatabaseConnection
Constructor method for a PostgreSQL database connection object.
DatabaseCredentialsManager - Class in file_handling
A class for managing the database credentials in an external file so that they may be retrieved easily.
DatabaseCredentialsManager() - Constructor for class file_handling.DatabaseCredentialsManager
Constructor for DatabaseCredentialsManager.
dbCatalog - Static variable in class application_frames.MainFrame
Database catalog frame
dbConnection - Static variable in class application_frames.MainFrame
Database connection object
dbHost - Static variable in class application_frames.SettingsFrame
 
dbHost - Static variable in class database.DatabaseConnection
String representing the host address where the database is hosted.
dbName - Static variable in class application_frames.SettingsFrame
 
dbName - Static variable in class database.DatabaseConnection
String representing the name of the database to which to connect.
dbPassword - Static variable in class application_frames.SettingsFrame
 
dbPort - Static variable in class application_frames.SettingsFrame
 
dbPort - Static variable in class database.DatabaseConnection
Integer representing the port number on which the database listens.
dbUser - Static variable in class database.DatabaseConnection
String representing the username with which to connect to the database.
dbUsername - Static variable in class application_frames.SettingsFrame

DrawIconButton - Class in core_components
Draw Icon button for drawing different shapes on the drawing panel.
The created buttons are further added to the MainFrame's drawing button group which handles the behaviors related to the drawing of shapes on the panel.

Creates the DrawIconButton
